name: second-drive
description: An E-Commerce website for selling parts of cars.

scripts.dev: docker compose down && docker volume rm --force secondrive_postgres-data && docker compose up -d && pnpm -F=api prisma && pnpm --parallel -r dev
scripts.dev:windows: docker compose down && docker volume rm --force secondrive_postgres-data && docker compose up -d && pnpm -F=api prisma:windows && pnpm --parallel -r dev:windows
scripts.up: docker compose down && docker volume rm --force secondrive_postgres-data && docker compose up -d
